SEARCH
Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.bukovja4.utils.logging

Class LOG

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.bukovja4.utils.logging.LOG
public final class LOG extends Object
Utility class for application logging with multiple severity levels. Provides colored console output and file logging with automatic rotation. Log files are stored in the "logs" directory and compressed when rotated.
See Also:
  • The underlying logging implementation
  • invalid reference 
    For implementing custom log observers

    • setLevel

      public static void setLevel(LOG.LogLevel level)
      Sets the minimum log level to display. Messages below this level will be filtered out.
      Parameters:
      level - The minimum log level to display

      public static <E extends Throwable> void error(String message, E exception, Object notThrow)
      Logs an exception. (Does not rethrow)
      Parameters:
      message - The error message to log
      exception - The exception to log and rethrow
      notThrow - Not used, but required for method signature. Anything passed here make log not throw.
